oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Quartermaster's Account Book, 1813
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two pages dated March 14 and 15, 1813 taken from an 1813 Quartermaster's Account Book. The record includes a list of companies serving with the Regiment of Tennessee volunteer cavalry as well as the number of rations assigned to each. The record is signed by Colonel John Coffee and Major General Andrew Jackson.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Dyas Collection of John Coffee Papers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee--History--War of 1812;Tennessee. Militia;United States--History--War of 1812--Registers
